alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 11:34AM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, areas with visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust expected. * WHERE...Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet, Crowley County and La Junta Vicinity/Otero County Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
